matches.matchText: Vasant Lad presents this ages-old science in a framework that is clearly accessible to the modern student while remaining true to its ancient roots, clarifying the mysteries of ayurveda from the classical Sanskrit texts. This text builds upon the information in Volume One , imparting the essential elements of clinical assessment.
